Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
13.01.2014 GB SCR18640 OK button: added additional test "Approval only allowed for users with department role CAPP_DEPARTMENT"
06.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
16.01.2012 SH SCR16905 Changed DBHS access now with DBHS_ID = MQDT_INVO_NO
-- Button OK
... lock MQ (active user)
.. set client lock
... MQDT row and client row is locked, continue approval procedure
.. reset client lock
... only if MQDT row still exists, could be deleted by another user and current
user didn't moved the cursor from parked row
... lock
... unlock
... lock not possible because locked by another user or MQDT is already deleted
by another user
Error: "You cannot approve your own changes"
-- Error: "Approval only allowed for users in" & HOFF_NAME (HOFF_CODE = MQDT_HOFF_CODE)
-- Error: Approval only allowed for users with department role & CAPP_DEPARTMENTROLE

ExpSyntax.val: (ISNULL ({0,24}) OR {0,24}='' OR {0,24}=User (0)) AND NOT (Stat (0,'C'MODE)) AND InStr ({1,7},'M')>0

SQL_STMT_U.val: select MQDT_DEPT_CODE, MQDT_USRID, MQDT_LINENO from :1/MQDT where MQDT_MQTY_ID = :2 and MQDT_ADMNO = :3 and MQDT_CLNTNO = :4 and MQDT_INVO_NO = :5 for fetch only

Text.val: -- Taks use DSQL to avoid problems with lost records which are deleted in BMQ010
